alert.note: Alert for Pocahontas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:36PM EDT until July 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pocahontas County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 336 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Marlinton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Marlinton and Edray. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
